item.title: Josh Hutcherson Is Pretty Obsessed With Dogs And Hopes You’ll Adopt One
item.description: The actor teamed up with Hill’s Pet Nutrition to visit adoptable pets at Pasadena Humane as part of NBCUniversal Local’s Clear The Shelters campaign.
